DOC.brief_summary: We put forward that polyphenols and vitamins have a cardiovascular prevention effect for subject with cardiovascular risk.
DOC.brief_title: Study on Effects of a Dairy Product Based on Polyphenols and Enriched With Vitamins B6, B9 and B12 on Some Cardiovascular Factor of Risk
DOC.criteria: BMI less than 33 kg/mÂ² Waist measurement higher than 90 cm for woman and 100 cm for man Normal or controled blood pressure (less than 16/9) nonsmoker Female with contraception Food allergy Cardiovascular pathology Medical treatment for cholesterol Higher consumption for dairy product and red fruit
DOC.keyword: Reduction of cardiovascular factor of risk
